pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, March 30, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, March 30, 2016:

Edmonton

9:50 a.m. MT The Prime Minister will meet with Edmonton families at the Edmonton Public Library.

Edmonton Public Library
Mill Woods Branch
2610 Hewes Way NW
Edmonton, Alberta

Notes for Media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later 9:30 a.m., Mountain Time (MT)

11:00 a.m. MT The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Edmonton Public Library
Mill Woods Branch
2610 Hewes Way NW
Edmonton, Alberta

Notes for Media:

  • Open media coverage

1:00 p.m. MT The Prime Minister will visit the Family Futures Resource Network.

Family Futures Millbourne
3756 78th Street NW
Edmonton, Alberta

Notes for Media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later 12:45 p.m. MT

8:30 p.m. ET The Prime Minister will arrive at Andrews Air Force Base in Washington, D.C., United States of America, for the Nuclear Security Summit.

Notes for Media:

  • Open media coverage

Media appearances

7:35 a.m. MT (Live) Morning News, Global Edmonton

9:00 a.m. MT  The Ryan Jespersen Show, AM630 CHED

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
